channel.title: I need help with Rainmeter!!!
channel.description: So today I decided to download Rainmeter, and I ran into a bit of a problem. I already tried Reddit and asked around to my friends, and I've still had no luck. So I decided that I might as well ask here. Theres no major issue to be seen, really. I just start up Rainmeter, and it works perfectly fine. But then, after about a minute or so, I go to use it, and it stops responding. No error, it just fails. I've tried Rainmeter 2.2 and 2.1, and I'm running Windows 7, 32-bit. I could really, really use some help. Thanks!

item.title: I need help with Rainmeter!!!

item.description:
XenoSpyro:

Seriously? :meh:

That’s what this is for: https://rainmeter.net/cms/Support

[COLOR=‘Black’]INB4 LOCK

Ah, right, sorry. I did, in fact, go to the forums there for help. But the verification e-mail for a new account is taking quite a while to go through. So still, any help is greatly appreciated.

item.title: I need help with Rainmeter!!!
item.dc:creator: Joka
item.description:
So today I decided to download Rainmeter, and I ran into a bit of a problem. I already tried Reddit and asked around to my friends, and I’ve still had no luck. So I decided that I might as well ask here.
Theres no major issue to be seen, really. I just start up Rainmeter, and it works perfectly fine. But then, after about a minute or so, I go to use it, and it stops responding. No error, it just fails.
I’ve tried Rainmeter 2.2 and 2.1, and I’m running Windows 7, 32-bit.
I could really, really use some help. Thanks!

Read full topic
